name: Saving Slash
summary: Make a check to reduce a critical hit against you to a normal hit.
description:
You quickly whirl your blade, trying to deflect enough momentum to avoid the worst of the attack. Attempt a DC 16 flat check. If you succeed, the attack becomes a normal hit, instead of a critical hit.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: An opponent critically hits you with a melee attack.
